Compatible with iOS 8, 9 and 10

An awesome free UI tweak for SpringBoard! It lets you choose the shape of your icon from 20+ icon shapes listed inside Settings app > SpringToolz. It can add shadow with various options to your icons. This version includes some experimental features like "Shape Animations" and "Icon Satellites", which at this point fail to start some time, but will be improved in future versions.

Configure options from Settings.

- fixed bug about flickering icons on app minimising when default shape is applied on it
- fixed bug about no icons inside folders when default shape is applied on them


- fixes to icons inside folders
- fixes to folder icons
- bigger circle icon shape
- rounded square icon shapes
- app minimising now does not break the icon shape
- little improvements on experimental features
